# LoginSafe

---


### Members
* AndrÃ©s Camilo Vivas
* John Kennedy Landazuri

---

This program is a Login with safe cibersecurity practices like:

  * Using PBKDF2 algorithm
  * Clean code
  * Variables scope (public, private)



> We use Android Studio for develop the solution, using Java as language.
![Android studio imagen](data:image/jpeg;base64,)
![Android studio imagen](data:image/png;base64,)

---

### Difficulties

* Under knowledge of algorithm PBKDF2 
* Concepts like password salting
* configure screens
---

### Conclusions

* A secure login, although slower, protects, provides security to users.

* The use of the PBKDF2 algorithm protects user passwords from brute force attacks, thanks to the number of iterations.

* It is necessary to use a proper hash algorithm to avoid collisions.

* In this project we apply the knowledge about cryptography of the course, and the good practices regarding java code.
